custom_data.description: Extra data to associate with the call. This will be passed through to any subscribed call events.

group_id.description: The ID of a group that will be used to initiate the call.

group_type.description: The type of a group that will be used to initiate the call.

is_consult.description: Enables the creation of a second call. If there is an ongoing call, it puts it on hold.

outbound_caller_id.description:
The e164-formatted number shown to the call recipient (or "blocked").

If set to "blocked", the recipient will receive a call from "unknown caller". The number can be the caller's number, or the caller's group number if the group is provided, or the caller's company reserved number.

user_id.description: The id of the user who should make the outbound call.
